segments.text: Tell me , Mr . Han . What do you suggest if we establish long term business relations ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Surely it's a sound idea , Mr . Joey . But I have a few questions for you first .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First , can I know something about your financial situations ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . As for our financial situation , you can inquire about them in the national bank . They handle all our financial documents .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . And how is your business in the clothing business circle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A very good question . It's very honorable for me to tell you that our business relations cover all over the world and they all have very good business reputation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then what do you deal with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We deal with kid's clothing , women's clothing , and men's clothing . You name it we deal with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's nice . They provided us with convenient choice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As for the regular customers , we have some favorable terms for them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: For the substantial regular customers , we offer 5 % commissions .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds attractive , all right , how about that we sign a one year contract ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fabulous . I will get the contract ready shortly .
segments.speaker: S1
